title: EndeavourOS Ditches Xfce for KDE Plasma with the Galileo Release
description:
EndeavourOS Galileo distribution is now available for download with KDE Plasma as the default desktop environment for the live ISO image.

The post EndeavourOS Ditches Xfce for KDE Plasma with the Galileo Release appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: Rocky Linux 9.3 Brings Back Cloud and Container Images for PowerPC 64-Bit
description:
Rocky Linux 9.3 distribution is now available for download with cloud and container images for ppc64le, a new kernel-uki package, and more.

The post Rocky Linux 9.3 Brings Back Cloud and Container Images for PowerPC 64-Bit appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: Fwupd 1.9.9 Released with Support for Lenovo X1 Yoga Gen7 530E 2-in-1 Laptops
description:
Fwupd 1.9.9 Linux firmware updating utility is now available for download with support for Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Yoga Gen7 530E 2-in-1 laptops and Advantech BMC devices.

The post Fwupd 1.9.9 Released with Support for Lenovo X1 Yoga Gen7 530E 2-in-1 Laptops appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: Open Source NVIDIA Vulkan Driver NVK Reaches Vulkan 1.0 Conformance
description:
Open Source NVIDIA Vulkan driver NVK is now officially conformant with the Vulkan 1.0 API on NVIDIA Turing hardware.

The post Open Source NVIDIA Vulkan Driver NVK Reaches Vulkan 1.0 Conformance appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
